00051 void CNCychpHeader::clear()
00052 {
00053   m_strARRFileName.clear();
00054   m_strARRGuid.clear();
00055   m_strChpID.clear();
00056   m_ucXChromosome = 0;
00057   m_ucYChromosome = 0;
00058   m_eGender = affx::UnknownGender;
00059   m_fYTarget = 0;
00060   m_fMAPD = 0;
00061   m_fPVQC = 0;
00062   m_fCQC = -1;
00063   m_bXX = false;
00064   m_bY = false;
00065   m_iWavinessSegCount = -1;
00066 }

00181 void CNCychpHeader::setGenderFromString(const AffxString& strIn)
00182 {
00183   AffxString str = strIn;
00184   AffxString strTemp = str.toLowerCase();
00185   if (strTemp == "male") {
00186     setGender(affx::Male);
00187   } else if (strTemp == "female") {
00188     setGender(affx::Female);
00189   } else {
00190     setGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00191   }
00192 }
00193 
00194 AffxString CNCychpHeader::getGenderAsString()
00195 {
00196   return affx::getGenderString(m_eGender);
00197 }

00306 /**
00307  * Compare function.
00308  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00309  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00310  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00311  */
00312 int CNCychpChromosomesSummary::compareTo(CNCychpChromosomesSummary& that, int iCompareCode)
00313 {
00314   int iCompareResult = 0;
00315   switch (iCompareCode) {
00316   case 0:
00317     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(m_ucChromosome, that.m_ucChromosome);
00318     break;
00319   }
00320   return iCompareResult;
00321 }

00333   m_fBAlleleSignal = 0;
00334   m_fSCAR = 0;
00335   m_cGenotypeCall = -1;
00336   m_bIsGenotypeCallSet = false;
00337   m_fGenotypeConfidence = 0;
00338   m_ucCnCall = 0;
00339   m_ucLohCall = 0;
00340   m_cSegmentInput = -1;
00341   m_cSegmentOutput = -1;

00344 CNCychpChromosomesSummaries::~CNCychpChromosomesSummaries()
00345 {
00346   clear();
00347 }
00348 void CNCychpChromosomesSummaries::clear()
00349 {
00350   deleteAll();
00351 }
00352 void CNCychpChromosomesSummaries::newCychpChromosomesSummary(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00353 {
00354   CNCychpChromosomesSummary* p = new CNCychpChromosomesSummary;
00355   u_int8_t uc = 0;
00356   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00357   float f = 0;
00358   AffxString str;
00359   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, uc);
00360   p->setChromosome(uc);
00361   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, str);
00362   p->setChromosomeDisplay(str);
00363   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);
00364   p->setStartIndex(ui);
00365   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, ui);
00366   p->setMarkerCount(ui);
00367   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 4, f);
00368   p->setMinSignal(f);
00369   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 5, f);
00370   p->setMaxSignal(f);
00371   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 6, f);
00372   p->setMedianCnState(f);
00373   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 7, f);
00374   p->setHomFrequency(f);
00375   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 8, f);
00376   p->setHetFrequency(f);
00377   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 9, f);
00378   p->setMosaicism(f);
00379   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 10, f);
00380   p->setLOH(f);
00381   add(p);
00382 }
00383 
00384 /**
00385  * @brief Set the allele code ffor the genotype call from the internal representation (-1, 0, 1, 2)
00386  * @param char - The internal representation
00387  */
00388 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::setGenotypeCallFromCode(char c)
00389 {
00390   switch (c) {
00391   case ALLELE_NO_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = -1; break;
00392   case ALLELE_A_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = 0; break;
00393   case ALLELE_AB_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = 1; break;
00394   case ALLELE_B_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = 2; break;
00395   default: m_cGenotypeCall = -1;
00396   }
00397 }
00398 
00399 /**
00400  * Compare function.
00401  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00402  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00403  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00404  */
00405 int CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::compareTo(CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber& that, int iCompareCode)
00406 {
00407   int iCompareResult = 0;
00408   switch (iCompareCode) {
00409   case 0:
00410     iCompareResult = m_strProbeSetName.compareTo(that.m_strProbeSetName, 0);
00411     break;
00412   case 1:
00413     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(m_ucChromosome, that.m_ucChromosome);
00414     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00415       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiPosition, that.m_uiPosition);
00416     }
00417     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00418       iCompareResult = m_strProbeSetName.compareTo(that.m_strProbeSetName, 0);
00419     }
00420     break;
00421   }
00422   return iCompareResult;
00423 }
00424 
00425 /**
00426  * @brief Return the CNNeutral call (0 or 1)
00427  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00428  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00429  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00430  * @return char - The call
00431  */
00432 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNNeutral(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00433 {
00434   return (((getCNGain(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome) == 0) && (getCNLoss(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome) == 0)) ? (char)1 : (char)0);
00435 }
00436 
00437 /**
00438  * @brief Return the CNGain call (0 or 1)
00439  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00440  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00441  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00442  * @return char - The call
00443  */
00444 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNGain(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00445 {
00446   char cCnGain = 0;
00447   if (m_ucChromosome == iXChromosome) {
00448     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00449       if (m_ucCnCall > 1) {
00450         cCnGain = 1;
00451       }
00452     } else {
00453       if (m_ucCnCall > 2) {
00454         cCnGain = 1;
00455       }
00456     }
00457   } else if (m_ucChromosome == iYChromosome) {
00458     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00459       if (m_ucCnCall > 1) {
00460         cCnGain = 1;
00461       }
00462     } else {
00463       if (m_ucCnCall > 0) {
00464         cCnGain = 1;
00465       }
00466     }
00467   } else {
00468     if (m_ucCnCall > 2) {
00469       cCnGain = 1;
00470     }
00471   }
00472   return cCnGain;
00473 }
00474 
00475 /**
00476  * @brief Return the CNLoss call (0 or 1)
00477  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00478  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00479  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00480  * @return char - The call
00481  */
00482 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNLoss(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00483 {
00484   char cCnLoss = 0;
00485   if (m_ucChromosome == iXChromosome) {
00486     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00487       if (m_ucCnCall < 1) {
00488         cCnLoss = 1;
00489       }
00490     } else {
00491       if (m_ucCnCall < 2) {
00492         cCnLoss = 1;
00493       }
00494     }
00495   } else if (m_ucChromosome == iYChromosome) {
00496     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00497       if (m_ucCnCall < 1) {
00498         cCnLoss = 1;
00499       }
00500     } else {
00501       cCnLoss = 0;
00502       //                if (m_ucCnCall < 0) {cCnNLoss = 1;}
00503     }
00504   } else {
00505     if (m_ucCnCall < 2) {
00506       cCnLoss = 1;
00507     }
00508   }
00509   return cCnLoss;
00510 }
00511 
00512 /**
00513  * @brief Return the CNNeutralLOH call (0 or 1)
00514  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00515  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00516  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00517  * @return char - The call
00518  */
00519 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNNeutralLoh(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00520 {
00521   char cCnNeutral = getCNNeutral(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome);
00522   return (((cCnNeutral == 1) && (m_ucLohCall == 1)) ? (char)1 : (char)0);
00523 }
00524 
00525 /**
00526  * @brief Return the NormalDiploid call (0 or 1)
00527  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00528  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00529  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00530  * @return char - The call
00531  */
00532 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getNormalDiploid(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00533 {
00534   char cCnNeutral = getCNNeutral(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome);
00535   return (((cCnNeutral == 1) && (m_ucLohCall == 0)) ? (char)1 : (char)0);
00536 }

00548 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers::newCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00549 {
00550   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p = new CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber;
00551   u_int8_t uc = 0;
00552   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00553   float f = 0;
00554   AffxString str;
00555   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, str);
00556   p->setProbeSetName(str);
00557   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, uc);
00558   p->setChromosome(uc);
00559   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);
00560   p->setPosition(ui);
00561   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, f);
00562   p->setLog2Ratio(f);
00563   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 5, f);
00564   p->setSmoothSignal(f);
00565   add(p);
00566 }
00567 
00568 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers::setCychpAlgorithmDataMarkerABSignal(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00569 {
00570   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00571   float f = 0;
00572   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, ui);
00573   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p = getAt(ui);
00574   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, f);
00575   p->setBAlleleSignal(f);
00576   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, f);
00577   p->setAAlleleSignal(f);
00578   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, f);
00579   p->setSCAR(f);
00580 }
00581 
00582 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers::setCychpGenotypingCalls(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00583 {
00584   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00585   int8_t c = 0;
00586   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, ui);
00587   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p = getAt(ui);
00588   if (pDataSet->Cols() == 9) { // it has a probeSetName column
00589     pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 4, c);    // ForcedCall column
00590   }
00591   else {
00592     pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, c);    // ForcedCall column
00593   }
00594   p->setGenotypeCallFromCode(c);
00595   p->setIsGenotypeCallSet(true);
00596 }

00697 /**
00698  * @brief Return the string associated with the segment type for this object.
00699  * @return AffxString - The segment type string.
00700  */
00701 AffxString CNCychpSegment::getSegmentType()
00702 {
00703   switch (m_uiDataSetIndex) {
00704   case 0: return "CN";
00705   case 1: return "LOH";
00706   case 2: return "CNNeutralLOH";
00707   case 3: return "NormalDiploid";
00708   case 4: return "Mosaicism";
00709   default: return "Unknown";
00710   }
00711   return "Unknown";
00712 }
00713 
00714 /**
00715  * Compare function.
00716  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00717  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00718  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00719  */
00720 int CNCychpSegment::compareTo(CNCychpSegment& that, int iCompareCode)
00721 {
00722   int iCompareResult = 0;
00723   switch (iCompareCode) {
00724   case 0:
00725     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiDataSetIndex, that.m_uiDataSetIndex);
00726     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00727       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiSegmentID, that.m_uiSegmentID);
00728     }
00729     break;
00730   case 1:
00731     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiDataSetIndex, that.m_uiDataSetIndex);
00732     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00733       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(m_ucChromosome, that.m_ucChromosome);
00734     }
00735     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00736       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiStartPosition, that.m_uiStartPosition);
00737     }
00738     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00739       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiStopPosition, that.m_uiStopPosition);
00740     }
00741     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00742       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiSegmentID, that.m_uiSegmentID);
00743     }
00744     break;
00745   }
00746   return iCompareResult;
00747 }
00748

00758 void CNCychpSegments::newCychpSegmentCN(unsigned int uiDataSetIndex, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00759 {
00760   CNCychpSegment* p = new CNCychpSegment;
00761   u_int8_t uc = 0;
00762   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00763   float f = 0;
00764   int32_t i = 0;
00765   AffxString str;
00766   p->setDataSetIndex(uiDataSetIndex);
00767   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, ui);
00768   p->setSegmentID(ui);
00769   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, uc);
00770   p->setChromosome(uc);
00771   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);
00772   p->setStartPosition(ui);
00773   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, ui);
00774   p->setStopPosition(ui);
00775   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 4, i);
00776   p->setMarkerCount(i);
00777   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 5, ui);
00778   p->setMeanMarkerDistance(ui);
00779   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 6, f);
00780   p->setFState(f);
00781   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 7, f);
00782   p->setConfidence(f);
00783   add(p);
00784 }

00812 void CNCychpSegments::newCychpSegmentMosaicism(unsigned int uiDataSetIndex, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00813 {
00814   CNCychpSegment* p = new CNCychpSegment;

00818   int32_t i = 0;

00821   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, ui);
00822   p->setSegmentID(ui);
00823   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, uc);
00824   p->setChromosome(uc);
00825   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);
00826   p->setStartPosition(ui);
00827   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, ui);
00828   p->setStopPosition(ui);
00829   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 4, i);
00830   p->setMarkerCount(i);
00831   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 5, ui); p->setMeanMarkerDistance(ui);
00832   //        pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 6, uc); p->setFState(uc);
00833   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 7, f);
00834   p->setConfidence(f);
00835   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 8, f);
00836   p->setFState(f);
00837   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 9, f);
00838   p->setMixture(f);
00839   add(p);
00840 }

00993 /**
00994  * Read the CNCychp file, and store the data in memory.
00995  * @param strFileName - The name of the CNCychp file to load data from.
00996  * @return - bool value. (true if successful)
00997  */
00998 bool CNCychp::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, AffxArray<CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber>& vProbeSets, bool bLoadProbeSetName, bool bNonNaNOnly)
00999 {
01000   AffxString strFamilialType = "";
01001   AffxString strPrompt = "";
01002   bool bSuccessful = false;
01003   clear();
01004   m_strFamilialType = strFamilialType;
01005   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
01006   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
01007   try {
01008     m_strFileName = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileName);
01009 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01010     if (strPrompt == "") {
01011       Verbose::out(1, "Reading CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01012     } else {
01013       Verbose::out(1, "Reading " + strPrompt + ": " + m_strFileName);
01014     }
01015     reader.SetFilename(m_strFileName);
01016     reader.Open(genericData);
01017     loadHeader(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
01018     WStringVector vDataGroupNames;
01019     genericData.DataGroupNames(vDataGroupNames);
01020     for (unsigned int uiDataGroupIndex = 0; (uiDataGroupIndex < vDataGroupNames.size()); uiDataGroupIndex++) {
01021       AffxString strDataGroupName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataGroupNames[uiDataGroupIndex]);
01022 //            Verbose::out(1, " DataGroupName = " + strDataGroupName);
01023       WStringVector vDataSetNames;
01024       genericData.DataSetNames(uiDataGroupIndex, vDataSetNames);
01025       for (unsigned int uiDataSetIndex = 0; (uiDataSetIndex < vDataSetNames.size()); uiDataSetIndex++) {
01026         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet = genericData.DataSet(uiDataGroupIndex, uiDataSetIndex);
01027         AffxString strDataSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataSetNames[uiDataSetIndex]);
01028 //                Verbose::out(1, "  DataSetName = " + strDataSetName);
01029         loadDataSet(strDataGroupName, strDataSetName, uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, vProbeSets, bLoadProbeSetName, bNonNaNOnly);
01030       }
01031       setCnCalls();
01032       setLohCalls();
01033 //            Verbose::out(1, "*");
01034     }
01035 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01036     genericData.Clear();
01037     bSuccessful = true;
01038   } catch (...) {
01039     genericData.Clear(); error("Cannot read CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01040   }
01041   return bSuccessful;
01042 }
01043 
01044 /**
01045  * Read the CNCychp file, and store the data in memory.
01046  * @param strFileName - The name of the CNCychp file to load data from.
01047  * @return - bool value. (true if successful)
01048  */
01049 bool CNCychp::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, const AffxString& strFamilialType, const AffxString& strPrompt)
01050 {
01051   bool bSuccessful = false;
01052   clear();
01053   m_strFamilialType = strFamilialType;
01054   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
01055   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
01056   try {
01057     m_strFileName = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileName);
01058 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01059     if (strPrompt == "") {
01060       Verbose::out(1, "Reading CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01061     } else {
01062       Verbose::out(1, "Reading " + strPrompt + ": " + m_strFileName);
01063     }
01064     reader.SetFilename(m_strFileName);
01065     reader.Open(genericData);
01066     loadHeader(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
01067     WStringVector vDataGroupNames;
01068     genericData.DataGroupNames(vDataGroupNames);
01069     for (unsigned int uiDataGroupIndex = 0; (uiDataGroupIndex < vDataGroupNames.size()); uiDataGroupIndex++) {
01070       AffxString strDataGroupName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataGroupNames[uiDataGroupIndex]);
01071 //            Verbose::out(1, " DataGroupName = " + strDataGroupName);
01072       WStringVector vDataSetNames;
01073       genericData.DataSetNames(uiDataGroupIndex, vDataSetNames);
01074       for (unsigned int uiDataSetIndex = 0; (uiDataSetIndex < vDataSetNames.size()); uiDataSetIndex++) {
01075         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet = genericData.DataSet(uiDataGroupIndex, uiDataSetIndex);
01076         AffxString strDataSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataSetNames[uiDataSetIndex]);
01077 //                Verbose::out(1, "  DataSetName = " + strDataSetName);
01078         loadDataSet(strDataGroupName, strDataSetName, uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet);
01079       }
01080       setCnCalls();
01081       setLohCalls();
01082 //            Verbose::out(1, "*");
01083     }
01084 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01085     genericData.Clear();
01086     bSuccessful = true;
01087   } catch (...) {
01088     genericData.Clear(); error("Cannot read CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01089   }
01090   return bSuccessful;
01091 }
01092 
01093 /**
01094  * Selectively read the CNCychp file, and store the data in memory.
01095  * @param groupDatasets - map containing calvin group nad dataset names to be read
01096  * @param strFileName - The name of the CNCychp file to load data from.
01097  * @return - bool value. (true if successful)
01098  */
01099 bool CNCychp::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, const groupDatasets_t& groupDatasets, const AffxString& strFamilialType, const AffxString& strPrompt)
01100 {
01101   bool bSuccessful = false;
01102   clear();
01103   m_strFamilialType = strFamilialType;
01104   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
01105   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
01106   try {
01107     m_strFileName = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileName);
01108 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01109     if (strPrompt == "") {
01110       Verbose::out(1, "Reading CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01111     } else {
01112       Verbose::out(1, "Reading " + strPrompt + ": " + m_strFileName);
01113     }
01114     reader.SetFilename(m_strFileName);
01115     reader.Open(genericData);
01116     loadHeader(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
01117     WStringVector vDataGroupNames;
01118     genericData.DataGroupNames(vDataGroupNames);
01119     for (unsigned int uiDataGroupIndex = 0; (uiDataGroupIndex < vDataGroupNames.size()); uiDataGroupIndex++) {
01120       AffxString strDataGroupName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataGroupNames[uiDataGroupIndex]);
01121       if (!isGroupPresent(groupDatasets, strDataGroupName)) {
01122         continue;
01123       }
01124       if (isGroupRedundant(strDataGroupName)) {
01125         continue;
01126       }
01127       //Verbose::out(1, " DataGroupName = " + strDataGroupName);
01128       WStringVector vDataSetNames;
01129       genericData.DataSetNames(uiDataGroupIndex, vDataSetNames);
01130       for (unsigned int uiDataSetIndex = 0; (uiDataSetIndex < vDataSetNames.size()); uiDataSetIndex++) {
01131         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet = genericData.DataSet(uiDataGroupIndex, uiDataSetIndex);
01132         AffxString strDataSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataSetNames[uiDataSetIndex]);
01133         if (!isGroupDatasetPresent(groupDatasets, strDataGroupName, strDataSetName)) {
01134           delete pDataSet;
01135           continue;
01136         }
01137         //Verbose::out(1, "  DataSetName = " + strDataSetName);
01138         loadDataSet(strDataGroupName, strDataSetName, uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet);
01139       }
01140       if (false) { // TB replaced by calls to isGroupPresent() and isGroupDatasetPresent() as needed
01141         setCnCalls();
01142         setLohCalls();
01143       }
01144       //Verbose::out(1, "*");
01145     }
01146     //Verbose::out(1, "*");
01147     genericData.Clear();
01148     bSuccessful = true;
01149   } catch (...) {
01150     genericData.Clear(); error("Cannot read CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01151   }
01152   return bSuccessful;
01153 }
01154 
01155 /**
01156  * Helper function: is the given group name present in the given group/dataset map
01157  * @param groupDatasets - map containing calvin group nad dataset names
01158  * @param groupName - calvin group name to check for in groupDatasets
01159  * @return - bool value. (true if groupDatasets contains groupName)
01160  */
01161 bool CNCychp::isGroupPresent(const groupDatasets_t& groupDatasets, const AffxString& groupName)
01162 {
01163   return groupDatasets.find(groupName) != groupDatasets.end();
01164 }
01165 
01166 bool CNCychp::isGroupRedundant(const AffxString& groupName)
01167 {
01168   // For future arrays elaborate as needed
01169 
01170   // Do not read AlgorithmData if array type is CytoScanHD
01171   return groupName == "AlgorithmData" && getCychpHeader().getArrayType() != "Cytogenetics_Array";
01172 }
01173 
01174 /**
01175  * Helper function: is the given group name AND dataset present in the given group/dataset map
01176  * @param groupDatasets - map containing calvin group nad dataset names
01177  * @param groupName - calvin group name to check for in groupDatasets
01178  * @param datasetName - calvin dataset name to check for in groupDatasets for group groupName
01179  * @return - bool value. (true if groupDatasets contains groupName/datasetName)
01180  */
01181 bool CNCychp::isGroupDatasetPresent(const groupDatasets_t& groupDatasets, const AffxString& groupName, const AffxString& datasetName)
01182 {
01183   bool status = false;
01184   groupDatasets_t::const_iterator pos = groupDatasets.find(groupName);
01185   if (pos != groupDatasets.end()) {
01186     if (pos->second.find(datasetName) != pos->second.end()) {
01187       status = true;
01188     }
01189   }
01190   return status;
01191 }
01192 
01193 
01194 /**
01195  * Load the CNCychp header into memory.
01196  * @param pHeader - A pointer to the affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader for the specified CNCychp file.
01197  */
01198 void CNCychp::loadHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
01199 {
01200   CNCychpHeader& header = getCychpHeader();
01201   affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType guid = pHeader->GetFileId();
01202   header.setChpID(guid);
01203   int iParamCount = pHeader->GetNameValParamCnt();
01204   affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
01205   bool bSelectedQCFound = m_selectedQC.empty();
01206   std::string paramName = "affymetrix-chipsummary-" + m_selectedQC;
01207   for (int iParamIndex = 0; (iParamIndex < iParamCount); iParamIndex++) {
01208     param = pHeader->GetNameValParam(iParamIndex);
01209     ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01210     if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-xChromosome") {
01211       header.setXChromosome((unsigned char)param.GetValueInt32());
01212     }
01213     ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01214     else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-yChromosome") {
01215       header.setYChromosome((unsigned char)param.GetValueInt32());
01216     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-call") {
01217       header.setGenderFromString(param.GetValueAscii());
01218     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-yTarget") {
01219       header.setYTarget(param.GetValueFloat());
01220     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-MAPD") {
01221       header.setMAPD(param.GetValueFloat());
01222     } else if ((m_selectedQC.empty() || (m_selectedQC == "snp-qc")) && StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-snp-qc") {
01223       header.setPVQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01224       if (!m_selectedQC.empty()) {header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());}    // special case to make sure "snp-qc" works for CQC.
01225       bSelectedQCFound = true;
01226     //} else if (m_selectedQC.empty() && StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-contrast-qc") {
01227     //  header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01228     } else if (m_selectedQC.empty() && StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-contrast-qc-nsp") {
01229       header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01230     } else if (!m_selectedQC.empty() && (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == paramName)) {
01231       header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01232       bSelectedQCFound = true;
01233     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-XX") {
01234       header.setXX(param.GetValueInt32());
01235     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-Y") {
01236       header.setY(param.GetValueInt32());
01237     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-waviness-seg-count") {
01238       header.setWavinessSegCount(param.GetValueInt32());
01239     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-ARR-file") {
01240       header.setARRFileName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
01241     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-ARR-guid") {
01242       header.setARRGuid(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
01243     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-reference-input") {
01244       header.setCNReferenceFileName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
01245     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-annotation-file") {
01246       header.setAnnotationFileName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
01247     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-array-type") {
01248       header.setArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
01249     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-dbsnp-date") {
01250       header.setDbsnpDate(param.GetValueAscii());
01251     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-dbsnp-version") {
01252       header.setDbsnpVersion(param.GetValueAscii());
01253     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-netaffx-annotation-date") {
01254       header.setNetaffxAnnotDate(param.GetValueAscii());
01255     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-netaffx-build") {
01256       header.setNetaffxBuild(param.GetValueAscii());
01257     }
01258   }
01259   /*
01260   if ((header.getXChromosome() == 0) || (header.getYChromosome() == 0)) {
01261     error("Cannot find affymetrix-algorithm-param-xChromosome and/or affymetrix-algorithm-param-yChromosome is CNCychp file header. FileName: " + m_strFileName);
01262   }
01263   */
01264   if (m_selectedQC != "" && bSelectedQCFound == false)
01265   {
01266       error("Cannot find the parameter in the cychp file header associated with the selected QC. Parameter: " 
01267           + paramName  + ", selected-qc: " + m_selectedQC + ", file name: " + m_strFileName);
01268   }
01269   pHeader->Clear();
01270 }

01272 /**
01273  * Load the CNCychp DataSet into memory.
01274  * @param strDataGroupName - The name of the CNCychp file data group.
01275  * @param strDataSetName - The name of the CNCychp file data set.
01276  * @param pDataSet - A pointer to the affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet object.
01277  */
01278 void CNCychp::loadDataSet(const AffxString& strDataGroupName, const AffxString& strDataSetName, unsigned int uiDataSetIndex, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet)
01279 {
01280   try {
01281     pDataSet->Open();
01282     if (strDataGroupName == "Chromosomes") {
01283       if (strDataSetName == "Summary") {
01284         getCychpChromosomesSummaries().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01285         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01286           getCychpChromosomesSummaries().newCychpChromosomesSummary(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01287         }
01288       } else {
01289         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01290       }
01291     } else if (strDataGroupName == "ProbeSets") {
01292       if (strDataSetName == "CopyNumber") {
01293         getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01294         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01295           getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().newCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01296         }
01297       } else if (strDataSetName == "AllelePeaks") { // AllelePeaks is currrently only used for browser display.
01298 //                getCychpProbeSetsAllelePeaks().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01299 //                for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++)
01300 //                {
01301 //                    getCychpProbeSetsAllelePeaks().newCychpProbeSetsAllelePeaks(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01302 //                }
01303       } else {
01304         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01305       }
01306     } else if (strDataGroupName == "AlgorithmData") {
01307       if (strDataSetName == "MarkerABSignal") {
01308         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01309           getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().setCychpAlgorithmDataMarkerABSignal(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01310         }
01311       } else {
01312         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01313       }
01314     } else if (strDataGroupName == "Segments") {
01315       if (strDataSetName == "CN") {
01316         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01317         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01318           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegmentCN(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01319         }
01320       } else if (strDataSetName == "LOH") {
01321         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01322         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01323           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegment(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01324         }
01325       } else if (strDataSetName == "CNNeutralLOH") {
01326         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01327         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01328           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegment(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01329         }
01330       } else if (strDataSetName == "NormalDiploid") {
01331         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01332         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01333           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegment(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01334         }
01335       } else if (strDataSetName == "Mosaicism") {
01336         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01337         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01338           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegmentMosaicism(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01339         }
01340       } else {
01341         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01342       }
01343     } else if (strDataGroupName == "Genotyping") {
01344       if (strDataSetName == "Calls") {
01345         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01346           getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().setCychpGenotypingCalls(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01347         }
01348       } else {
01349         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01350       }
01351     } else {
01352       pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data group name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01353     }
01354     pDataSet->Delete();
01355   } catch (...) {
01356     pDataSet->Delete();
01357     throw;
01358   }
01359 }
01360 
01361 /**
01362  * Load the CNCychp DataSet into memory.
01363  * @param strDataGroupName - The name of the CNCychp file data group.
01364  * @param strDataSetName - The name of the CNCychp file data set.
01365  * @param pDataSet - A pointer to the affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet object.
01366  */
01367 void CNCychp::loadDataSet(const AffxString& strDataGroupName, const AffxString& strDataSetName, unsigned int uiDataSetIndex, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, AffxArray<CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber>& vProbeSets, bool bLoadProbeSetName, bool bNonNaNOnly)
01368 {
01369   try {
01370     pDataSet->Open();
01371     if (strDataGroupName == "ProbeSets") {
01372       if (strDataSetName == "CopyNumber") {
01373         u_int8_t uc = 0;
01374         u_int32_t ui = 0;
01375         float f = 0;
01376         AffxString str;
01377         getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01378                 int uiRowIndex = 0;
01379         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); iIndex++) {
01380           if (uiRowIndex >= vProbeSets.getCount()) {
01381             //Err::errAbort("Not enough Probe Sets allocated to hold the entire CYCHP file.");
01382                         break;
01383           }
01384           if (bLoadProbeSetName)
01385           {
01386               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 0, str); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setProbeSetName(str);
01387               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 1, uc); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setChromosome(uc);
01388               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 2, ui); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setPosition(ui);
01389               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 3, f); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setLog2Ratio(f);
01390                           if ((bNonNaNOnly) && (static_cast<double>(f) != static_cast<double>(f))) {continue;}
01391               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 5, f); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setSmoothSignal(f);
01392 
01393           }
01394           else
01395           {
01396               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 1, uc); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setChromosome(uc);
01397               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 3, f); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setLog2Ratio(f);
01398                           if ((bNonNaNOnly) && (static_cast<double>(f) != static_cast<double>(f))) {continue;}
01399           }
01400                   uiRowIndex++;
01401         }
01402       }
01403     }
01404     pDataSet->Delete();
01405   } catch (...) {
01406     pDataSet->Delete();
01407     throw;
01408   }
01409 }
01410 
01411 /**
01412  * Determine the CN call values from the CycchpSegments data and set the CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber accordingly.
01413  */
01414 void CNCychp::setCnCalls()
01415 {
01416   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers& vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers = getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers();
01417   CNCychpSegments& vCychpSegments = getCychpSegments();
01418   for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < vCychpSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++) {
01419     CNCychpSegment* pSegment = vCychpSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
01420     if (pSegment->getDataSetIndex() == 0) { // CN
01421       for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; (iMarkerIndex < vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getCount()); iMarkerIndex++) {
01422         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getAt(iMarkerIndex);
01423         if (pMarker->getChromosome() == pSegment->getChromosome()) {
01424           if (pMarker->getPosition() >= pSegment->getStartPosition()) {
01425             if (pMarker->getPosition() <= pSegment->getStopPosition()) {
01426               pMarker->setCnCall((unsigned char)pSegment->getFState());
01427             }
01428           }
01429         }
01430       }
01431     }
01432   }
01433 }
01434 
01435 /**
01436  * Determine the LOH call values from the CNCychpSegments data and set the CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber accordingly.
01437  */
01438 void CNCychp::setLohCalls()
01439 {
01440   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers& vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers = getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers();
01441   CNCychpSegments& vCychpSegments = getCychpSegments();
01442   for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < vCychpSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++) {
01443     CNCychpSegment* pSegment = vCychpSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
01444     if (pSegment->getDataSetIndex() == 1) { // LOH
01445       for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; (iMarkerIndex < vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getCount()); iMarkerIndex++) {
01446         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getAt(iMarkerIndex);
01447         if (pMarker->getChromosome() == pSegment->getChromosome()) {
01448           if (pMarker->getPosition() >= pSegment->getStartPosition()) {
01449             if (pMarker->getPosition() <= pSegment->getStopPosition()) {
01450               pMarker->setLohCall((unsigned char)pSegment->getFState());
01451             }
01452           }
01453         }
01454       }
01455     }
01456   }
01457 }

01459 /**
01460  * @brief a Xerces SAX Handler class for parsing XML
01461  */
01462 class ARRSAXHandler : public XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::HandlerBase
01463 {
01464 private:
01465   CNCychp* m_pCNCychp;
01466   unsigned int m_uiOptionCount;
01467 
01468 public :
01469   ARRSAXHandler(CNCychp* p) : m_pCNCychp(p), m_uiOptionCount(0) {
01470     if (m_pCNCychp == NULL) {
01471       Err::errAbort("ARRSAXHandler must be constructed with a valid CNCychp pointer.");
01472     }
01473   }
01474   ~ARRSAXHandler() {}
01475 
01476   unsigned int getOptionCount() const {
01477     return m_uiOptionCount;
01478   }
01479 
01480   void warning(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {
01481     Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: " + toString(exc.getMessage()));
01482   }
01483   void error(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {
01484     Err::errAbort(toString(exc.getMessage()));
01485   }
01486   void fatalError(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {
01487     Err::errAbort(toString(exc.getMessage()));
01488   }
01489 
01490   void startDocument() {
01491     m_uiOptionCount = 0;
01492   }
01493 
01494   /**
01495    * @brief Convert the internal representation to a std::string
01496    * @param const XMLCh* const - The pointer to convert
01497    * @return std::string - The resulting string value
01498    */
01499   static std::string toString(const XMLCh* const in) {
01500     char* p = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::transcode(in);
01501     std::string str = p;
01502     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::release(&p);
01503     return str;
01504   }
01505 
01506   /**
01507    * @brief Do the XML parsing
01508    * @param const XMLCh* const - The pointer to the element name
01509    * @param XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList& - The attribute list
01510    */
01511   void startElement(const XMLCh* const name, XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList& attributes) {
01512     try {
01513       std::string strElementName = toString(name);
01514       //        Verbose::out(1, "Element=" + strElementName);
01515       m_uiOptionCount++;
01516       std::string strGuid;
01517       for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < attributes.getLength()); iIndex++) {
01518         std::string strAttributeName = toString(attributes.getName(iIndex));
01519         std::string strAttributeType = toString(attributes.getType(iIndex));
01520         std::string strAttributeValue = toString(attributes.getValue(iIndex));
01521         //            Verbose::out(1, "AttributeName=" + strAttributeName + ", AttributeType=" + strAttributeType + ", AttributeValue=" + strAttributeValue);
01522         if (strAttributeName == "GUID") {
01523           strGuid = strAttributeValue;
01524         }
01525       }
01526       if (strElementName == "ArraySetFile") {
01527         m_pCNCychp->setARRGuid(strGuid);
01528       }
01529     } catch (...) {
01530       Err::errAbort("ARRSAXHandler::startElement() failed.");
01531     }
01532   }
01533 };
01534 
01535 /**
01536  * @brief Load GUD from an XML file.
01537  * @param strFileName - The name of the XML file to load parameters from.
01538  */
01539 AffxString CNCychp::getGuidFromARRFile(const std::string& strFileName)
01540 {
01541   m_strARRGuid = "";
01542 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01543 //        Verbose::out(1, "Loading guid from file: " + strFileName);
01544   // Initialize the XML4C system
01545   try {
01546     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
01547   }
01548 
01549   catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch) {
01550     Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed at XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize(). Msg: " + ARRSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
01551   }
01552 
01553   //
01554   //  Create a SAX parser object to use and create our SAX event handlers
01555   //  and plug them in.
01556   //
01557   XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser* parser = new XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser;
01558   ARRSAXHandler handler(this);
01559   parser->setDocumentHandler(&handler);
01560   parser->setErrorHandler(&handler);
01561   parser->setValidationScheme(XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser::Val_Auto);
01562   parser->setDoNamespaces(false);
01563   parser->setDoSchema(false);
01564   parser->setValidationSchemaFullChecking(false);
01565 
01566   //
01567   //  Ok, lets do the progressive parse loop. On each time around the
01568   //  loop, we look and see if the handler has found what its looking
01569   //  for. When it does, we fall out then.
01570   //
01571   unsigned long duration;
01572   int errorCount = 0;
01573   try {
01574     // Create a progressive scan token
01575     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPScanToken token;
01576     const unsigned long startMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
01577     try {
01578       if (!parser->parseFirst(strFileName.c_str(), token)) {
01579         Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed at parser->parseFirst(). FileName: " + strFileName);
01580       }
01581     } catch (...) {
01582       Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed at parser->parseFirst(). FileName: " + strFileName);
01583     }
01584 
01585     //
01586     //  We started ok, so lets call scanNext() until we find what we want
01587     //  or hit the end.
01588     //
01589     bool gotMore = true;
01590     while (gotMore && !parser->getErrorCount()) {
01591       gotMore = parser->parseNext(token);
01592     }
01593 
01594     const unsigned long endMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
01595     duration = endMillis - startMillis;
01596 
01597     errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
01598     //
01599     //  Reset the parser-> In this simple progrma, since we just exit
01600     //  now, its not technically required. But, in programs which
01601     //  would remain open, you should reset after a progressive parse
01602     //  in case you broke out before the end of the file. This insures
01603     //  that all opened files, sockets, etc... are closed.
01604     //
01605     parser->parseReset(token);
01606   } catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::OutOfMemoryException&) {
01607     delete parser;
01608     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01609     Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed with an OutOfMemoryException. FileName: " + strFileName);
01610   } catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch) {
01611     delete parser;
01612     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01613     Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed with an XMLException. Msg: " + ARRSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
01614   }
01615 
01616 //    Verbose::out(1, "XMLFileName = " + strFileName + ", OptionCount = " + ToStr(handler.getOptionCount()));
01617 //    Verbose::out(1, "*");
01618   delete parser;
01619   XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01620   return m_strARRGuid;
01621 }
